button.name: action_invoice_sent
button.invisible: state != 'posted' or is_being_sent or invoice_pdf_report_id or move_type not in ('out_invoice', 'out_refund')

button.name: action_invoice_sent
button.invisible: state != 'posted' or not is_being_sent and not invoice_pdf_report_id or move_type not in ('out_invoice', 'out_refund', 'in_invoice', 'in_refund')

button.name: action_register_payment
button.invisible: state != 'posted' or payment_state not in ('not_paid', 'partial') or move_type not in ('out_invoice', 'out_refund', 'in_invoice', 'in_refund', 'out_receipt', 'in_receipt')

button.name: button_cancel
button.invisible: not id or state != 'draft' or move_type != 'entry'

button.name: button_cancel
button.invisible: not id or state != 'draft' or move_type == 'entry'

button.name: button_request_cancel
button.invisible: state != 'posted' or show_reset_to_draft_button or not need_cancel_request

form.div: Warning: this bill might be a duplicate of
This invoice is being sent in the background.

div.invisible: move_type not in ('out_invoice', 'out_receipt') or not invoice_has_outstanding or payment_state not in ('not_paid', 'partial')

form.div: You have outstanding credits for this customer. You can allocate them to mark this invoice as paid.

div.invisible: move_type not in ('in_invoice', 'in_receipt') or not invoice_has_outstanding or payment_state not in ('not_paid', 'partial')

form.div: You have outstanding debits for this vendor. You can allocate them to mark this bill as paid.

div.invisible: move_type != 'out_refund' or not invoice_has_outstanding or payment_state not in ('not_paid', 'partial')

form.div: You have outstanding debits for this customer. You can allocate them to mark this credit note as paid.

div.invisible: move_type != 'in_refund' or not invoice_has_outstanding or payment_state not in ('not_paid', 'partial')

form.div: You have outstanding credits for this vendor. You can allocate them to mark this credit note as paid.
This move is configured to be posted automatically at the accounting date: .
auto-posting enabled. Next accounting date: . The recurrence will end on (included).

div.invisible: not display_inactive_currency_warning or move_type not in ('in_invoice', 'in_refund', 'in_receipt')

form.div: In order to validate this bill, you must activate the currency of the bill. The journal entries need to be computed by Odoo before being posted in your company's currency.

div.invisible: not display_inactive_currency_warning or move_type not in ('out_invoice', 'out_refund', 'out_receipt')

form.div: In order to validate this invoice, you must activate the currency of the invoice. The journal entries need to be computed by Odoo before being posted in your company's currency.

button.name: action_open_business_doc
button.invisible: move_type != 'entry' or not id or not payment_id

button.name: open_reconcile_view
button.invisible: move_type != 'entry' or not id or not has_reconciled_entries

widget.name: web_ribbon
widget.tooltip: This entry has been generated through the Invoicing app, before installing Accounting. It has been disabled by the 'Invoicing Switch Threshold Date' setting so that it does not impact your accounting.

div.div: The current highest number is . You might want to put a higher number here.

field.name: name
field.invisible: name == '/' and not posted_before and not quick_edit_mode

span.invisible: state != 'draft' or name != '/' or posted_before or quick_edit_mode

field.name: partner_id
field.context: { 'res_partner_search_mode': (context.get('default_move_type', 'entry') in ('out_invoice', 'out_refund', 'out_receipt') and 'customer') or (context.get('default_move_type', 'entry') in ('in_invoice', 'in_refund', 'in_receipt') and 'supplier') or False, 'show_address': 1, 'default_is_company': True, 'show_vat': True}

field.name: invoice_line_ids
field.context: { 'default_move_type': context.get('default_move_type'), 'journal_id': journal_id, 'default_partner_id': commercial_partner_id, 'default_currency_id': currency_id or company_currency_id, 'default_display_type': 'product', 'quick_encoding_vals': quick_encoding_vals, }

field.name: product_id
field.domain: context.get('default_move_type') in ('out_invoice', 'out_refund', 'out_receipt') and [('sale_ok', '=', True)] or [('purchase_ok', '=', True)]

field.name: analytic_distribution
field.business_domain_compute: parent.move_type in ['out_invoice', 'out_refund', 'out_receipt'] and 'invoice' or parent.move_type in ['in_invoice', 'in_refund', 'in_receipt'] and 'bill' or 'general'

div.t-attf-class: oe_kanban_card oe_kanban_global_click ps-0 pe-0 {{ record.display_type.raw_value ? 'o_is_' + record.display_type.raw_value : '' }}

field.name: tax_totals
field.readonly: state != 'draft' or (move_type not in ('in_invoice', 'in_refund', 'in_receipt') and not quick_edit_mode)

field.name: line_ids
field.context: { 'default_move_type': context.get('default_move_type'), 'line_ids': line_ids, 'journal_id': journal_id, 'default_partner_id': commercial_partner_id, 'default_currency_id': currency_id or company_currency_id, 'kanban_view_ref': 'account.account_move_line_view_kanban_mobile', }

field.name: analytic_distribution
field.business_domain_compute: parent.move_type in ['out_invoice', 'out_refund', 'out_receipt'] and 'invoice' or parent.move_type in ['in_invoice', 'in_refund', 'in_receipt'] and 'bill' or 'general'

field.name: tax_ids
field.readonly: display_type in ('line_section', 'line_note') or tax_line_id or (parent.move_type in ('out_invoice', 'out_refund', 'in_invoice', 'in_refund', 'out_receipt', 'in_receipt') and account_type in ('asset_receivable', 'liability_payable'))

div.span: This entry has been generated through the Invoicing app, before installing Accounting. Its balance has been imported separately.

field.name: invoice_source_email
field.invisible: move_type not in ('in_invoice', 'in_refund') or not invoice_source_email

kanban.default_order: x_studio_priority desc, x_studio_sequence asc, id desc

record.field: Odoo Studio: Default search view for x_public_tender_tracki customization
Odoo Studio: Default form view for x_public_tender_tracki customization
Odoo Studio: Default form view for x_online_payments customization

tr.t-att-class: 'bg-200 fw-bold o_line_section' if line.display_type == 'line_section' else 'fst-italic o_line_note' if line.display_type == 'line_note' else ''

t.t-value: pos_orders[0].lines.filtered(lambda l: l.product_id == down_payment_product and l.price_subtotal_incl == line.price_total).mapped('sale_order_origin_id')

div.p: Please use the following communication for your payment :

div.t-attf-class: #{'col-7' if report_type != 'html' else 'col-sm-7 col-md-6'} mt-2 mb-2

p.strong: Scan me with your banking app.

t.t-if: doc.partner_shipping_id == doc.partner_invoice_id and doc.partner_invoice_id != doc.partner_id or doc.partner_shipping_id != doc.partner_invoice_id

tr.t-att-class: 'bg-200 fw-bold o_line_section' if line.display_type == 'line_section' else 'fst-italic o_line_note' if line.display_type == 'line_note' else ''

td.name: td_note_line
td.span: A note, whose content usually applies to the section or product above.

t.t-if: current_section and (line_last or doc.order_line[line_index+1].display_type == 'line_section') and not line.is_downpayment
